title: Daily Discussion 12/8
content:
ğŸ”œ If your fiance / fiancee wants your property to be shared with him, would you agree?

- 

Okay, I might wonder why. Is it because of insecurity? 
Some people think that talking about money is taboo for couples. I totally disagree. 
Most people hope that love will finally enter into marriage, and marriage is the starting point for two people to start living together. The sharing of money concepts is one of the important links.
So, I will appreciate if he ask me because that's the trust of relationship.
(Even if I say no ...)
